task.title: Redesign base UI styling per design spec
task.author: user

steps.summary: Request: read custom.css and design-spec.md, then perform a design redesign.
Reviewed existing base styles in custom.css and UI constraints in design-spec.md to keep class set unchanged.
Refreshed the neutral palette, spacing, and control styling while keeping the same class inventory to comply with the design contract.
Updated base UI styles and component polish in custom.css (colors, spacing, typography, button/input states).

evaluations.notes: No automated tests or linters were run for CSS updates.

final_summary: Refreshed the base UI styling in custom.css with a calmer grayscale palette, refined spacing, and improved control states while preserving the existing class contract from the design spec.
